title: Live score: Bayer Leverkusen v Roma (UEFA Champions League) - World - Sports
text:
Related UEFA Champions League group stage results & fixtures (3rd matchday) Egypt's Salah scores fourth Serie A goal as Roma beat Empoli 3-1 PHOTO GALLERY: Arsenal beat Manchester United, Real Madrid draw in derby, Roma win in Italy Roma beat Palermo, Inter move top of Serie A Stay tuned as match is due to start at 20:45 Cairo time (GMT+2)
